description: Array read by diagonals: T(h,k)=number of paths consisting of steps from (0,0) to (h,k) such that each step has length 1 directed up or right and no up-step crosses the line y=3x/4. (Thus a path crosses the line only at lattice points and on right-steps.).
author: _Clark Kimberling_. Definition revised Dec 08 2006
